body.description: Made from premium denim with built-in stretch, Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. Heritage High Rise Loose Utility Jeans are a prime example of our heritage and expertise. With a loose fit through the hip and thigh, they're a versatile addition to your denim lineup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the style. A little tighter around the thighs.
reviews.reviewText: I love these jeans but I did expect them to fit a little looser around the thighs. I’m in between sizes. A 14 -16 depending on the style. Most of my weight sits in my stomach and I wanted these to be loose so I ordered a 16. They fit like a glove. Which isn’t exactly what I wanted. However I did get them for Christmas so holiday weight also may have played a role. They look great on and are not too tight but they just aren’t loose either. I’m keeping them but for a true loose fit pair of jeans I might look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loose fitting, comfy jeans
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking utility pocket jeans, just as pictured. I am 5'9" and the pant legs are even long on me. Not to the point where they catch under my heel or need shortening, but for anyone with shorter legs I think they would require alteration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curve hugging in all the right places😍🤩
reviews.reviewText: My current dimensions are 36-27-37, 5'3,125lbs and slim/skinny fat.I'm a 27 in Levi's and a 4 in old navy IF jeans are 98/99% cotton but if they are skinny/tight fit then I'm a 6 mostly.These have around 10% polyester and around 90% cotton however and I fit a size 2 perfectly. I read the reviews stating that these seem to run big on others so I took a gamble and ordered a size 2 since I consider myself to be on the lower end of a size 4 currently. These fit my body to a T and honestly look AMAZING on so much so that I'm buying a size 4 to have as a back up since personally my weight fluctuates. Plus I always buy extras of things I truly love since I'm picky and it's getting harder to find things I like at a decent price. These are definitely worth trying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I'm '5"9 and 130lbs, these are a perfect fit for my long legs! I love the little pockets that give it such a cute look, and that they are nice and loose and modest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hear me out
reviews.reviewText: Ok I like these but they’re the most high waisted pants I’ve ever worn. They go all the way up to my ribs. It’s a bit too high for my torso. And the legs were super long too so I had to roll them up. Other than that I still wear them and they comfortable and have a good stretch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were way too long and the size was off. These run small in the waist so order a size up. Expected straight legs but they were tapered and extremely unflattering. Did not look anything like the picture. Hard pass on these and returned for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pair of pants!
reviews.reviewText: Finding the right fit in a pant is hard and I was surprised these fit me so well. I am a 14/32 and orders both the 14 and 16 because you never know. I am 5'9" 200 lbs, apple shape, and the 14 fit fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I love how they look but they gave me BLISTERS
reviews.reviewText: These look really cute. I wore them once, and after about an hour I could feel some irritation on the outside of my left thigh, so I checked it out and saw raw, red irritation. I put a bandaid on it and when I removed them at the end of the day I had 3 other HUGE blisters on my derriere. I didn't feel anything irritating those areas all day and it made me think maybe it was some kind of chemical irritation. I've washed them since and as soon as the blisters heal I'll try again. It's probably too late to return them if it happens again.
